tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE scouting_reports (
	sr_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	player_id INT,
	report TEXT,
	date_submitted TIMESTAMP,
	scout_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE scouting_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id UUID,
  scout_id UUID,
  report_text TEXT,
  report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE player_contracts (
  contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id UUID,
  agent_id UUID,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  contract_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE scouting_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    scout_name TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE player_contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    team_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE agent_relationships (
    agent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name TEXT,
    agency_name TEXT,
    player_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE scouting_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    scout_name VARCHAR(50),
    report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE player_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2),
    team VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE player_details (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE scouting_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    scout_name VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    report_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE player_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE,
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
